ai.summary: Mill Race Trail is a gentle 5.1 km walk in the UK, suitable for most ages and abilities. The route follows pleasant paths with minimal elevation, offering a relaxed day hike through easy terrain and scenic surroundings.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly level and well-maintained path with short sections of compact gravel or boardwalk. Occasional mud or puddles after rain and near the water, so waterproof footwear is helpful.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy walking shoes and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on marked paths, especially near the river or water features. Check local notices for any closures. Be mindful of weather and tide conditions if sections run adjacent to water. Keep dogs under control and bring a small first-aid kit and emergency contact information.
